snippet.title: The Dark Crystal walkthrough (Apple II - Sierra On-Line)
snippet.description:
"In a faraway world, an event of cosmic importance is about to occur: a Great Conjunction of the planet's Three Suns. A thousand years ago, when the Suns last came together, a cruel and selfish tribe known as the Skeksis seized control of the radiant Crystal that once brought harmony to all beings. A quarrel erupted and blows were stuck, fracturing the Crystal and sending a shard flying off into the countryside. The Crystal darkened, and evil spread like a cloud across the land. Now, as Jen, last known survivor of.the Gelfing race, it is up to you to travel the world and fulfill an ancient prophecy by restoring the missing shard of the Dark Crystal. The power to end the Skeksis' reign is yours..."

The Dark Crystal (http://www.mobygames.com/game/hi-res-adventure-6-the-dark-crystal) was a graphics adventure game published by Sierra On-Line in 1983 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.wikipedia.org
Walkthrough - www.textfiles.com (Doctor Flora)
Image - 4AM
